alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 3:01AM EDT until August 24 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 345 AM EDT. * At 301 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Luna Pier to 12 miles north of Oak Harbor, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Perrysburg, Oregon, Rossford, Northwood, Oak Harbor, Genoa, Elmore, Maumee, Walbridge, Millbury, Luckey, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center, Harbor View, Reno Beach, Williston, Bono and Stony Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
